title: VELVET CAVIAR Crossbody Phone Strap
description: UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: Works seamlessly with all phone cases, including compatible with iPhone 16 Pro Max, 15, 14, 13, Samsung Galaxy S25, and more.
GO HANDS-FREE: Perfect as a cell phone lanyard for women, this clip-and-go phone strap keeps your phone secure and your hands free during daily activities, events, and travel.
PREMIUM MATERIALS: Built with durable, high-strength materials and detachable clasps for easy installation and secure phone attachment.
EASY INSTALLATION: Quickly attach the crossbody phone holder to your case by sliding the attachment piece through and securing the clasps.
WHAT’S INCLUDED: One 48" crossbody phone strap plus a 1-year manufacturer warranty, phone case not included.
Go hands free with our crossbody phone strap! Universally compatible with any case for iPhone or Samsung.
